delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Whois.WhoEventHandler ( UserInfo  user,
string  channel,
string  ircServer,
string  mask,
int  hopCount,
string  realName,
bool  last 
)

The response to a Sender.Who request.

Parameters:
user The subject of the query
channel The channel the user is on
ircServer The name of the user's IRC server
mask The user's mode mask
hopCount Number of network hops to the user
realName The user's real name
last True if this is the last response
See also:
Listener.OnWho

The response to a Sender.Whois request.

Parameters:
whoisInfo The data associated with the nick queried.
